needs: Seeks a full‑time research role (London/Africa) where they can design and run measurable studies, instrument outcomes, and deliver rapid, observable improvements. Requires cross‑functional authority to run probes, implement runbooks/SLOs and dashboards, manage modest budgets with governance, and produce reproducible open datasets within 90‑day delivery rhythms.
personality: Analytical and systems‑oriented, they prioritize clear outcomes, readable code, and humane processes. They surface unknowns early with probes and small experiments, prefer incremental delivery, and keep lightweight artifacts like decision records and demos. They value reliability, inclusion, ownership, and mentor peers through pairing and concise narrative documentation.
